gobblin.data.management.trash

Class Trash

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.trash.Trash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GobblinTrash
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProxiedTrash

    public class Trash
extends Object
implements GobblinTrash
    Flexible implementation of Trash similar to Hadoop trash. Allows for injecting cleanup policies for snapshots.

    • Field Detail

      • TRASH_LOCATION_KEY

        public static final String TRASH_LOCATION_KEY
        Location of trash directory in file system. The location can include a token $USER that will be automatically replaced by the name of the active user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getTrashLocation

        public Path getTrashLocation()
                      throws IOException
        Get trash location.
        Returns:
        Path for trash directory.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createTrashLocation

        protected Path createTrashLocation(FileSystem fs,
                                   Properties props,
                                   String user)
                            throws IOException
        Create location of Trash directory. Parsed from props at key TRASH_LOCATION_KEY, defaulting to /home/directory/_GOBBLIN_TRASH.
        Parameters:
        fs - FileSystem where trash should be found.
        props - Properties containing trash configuration.
        user - If the trash location contains the token $USER, the token will be replaced by the value of user.
        Returns:
        Path for trash directory.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • ensureTrashLocationExists

        protected void ensureTrashLocationExists(FileSystem fs,
                                         Path trashLocation)
                                  throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • moveToTrash

        public boolean moveToTrash(Path path)
                    throws IOException
        Move a path to trash. The absolute path of the input path will be replicated under the trash directory.
        Specified by:
        moveToTrash in interface GobblinTrash
        Parameters:
        path - FileSystem path to move to trash.
        Returns:
        true if move to trash was done successfully.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createTrashSnapshot

        public void createTrashSnapshot()
                         throws IOException
        Moves all current contents of trash directory into a snapshot directory with current timestamp.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • purgeTrashSnapshots

        public void purgeTrashSnapshots()
                         throws IOException
        For each existing trash snapshot, uses a SnapshotCleanupPolicy to determine whether the snapshot should be deleted. If so, delete it permanently.

        Each existing snapshot will be passed to SnapshotCleanupPolicy.shouldDeleteSnapshot(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus, gobblin.data.management.trash.Trash) from oldest to newest, and will be deleted if the method returns true.

        Throws:
        IOException
